document_data.name: Widow's Blossom
document_data.mainbody: '''Widow's blossom''' was a species of flowering plant known for its pleasant scent.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], widow's blossoms were available in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the [[Western Heartlands]]. Some used widow's blossom and [[whispering bloom]] to scent [[wax]] used in flower preservation, however, the addition affected the solution's integrity.
